quote: This was what I liked most about my friends: just sitting around and telling stories. Window stories and mirror stories. I only listened - the stories on my mind weren't that funny.
quote_letters: THIS WAS WHAT I LIKED MOST ABOUT MY FRIENDS JUST SITTING AROUND AND TELLING STORIES WINDOW STORIES AND MIRROR STORIES I ONLY LISTENED - THE STORIES ON MY MIND WERENT THAT FUNNY
